Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



In this time of uncertainty and unrest the members of the Purdue Academic Advising Association PACADA affirm the dignity and value of all students regardless of race gender identity disability sexual orientation religion political affiliation or national origin PERIOD We care about you and support you PERIOD

As academic advisors it is our responsibility not only to assist you with course selection registration and your academic goals but also to direct you to helpful resources PERIOD Therefore we suggest that students in need of support in addition to contacting your academic advisor look to the campus offices below listed in alphabetical order as needed PERIOD

If you experience acts of hate and bias on campus we encourage you to report them to Purdue University Police as well as to the Division of Diversity and Inclusion through the REPORT HATE and BIAS link on httpwww.purdue.edudiversityinclusion PERIOD

Asian American and Asian Resource and Cultural Center

httpwww.purdue.eduaaarcc

Black Cultural Center

httpwww.purdue.edunaecc

Residential Life

httpswww.housing.purdue.eduResidentialLife

 Colleen E Brown Academic Advisor   PACADA Chair
